name: JSON extraction rule
value: Always extract JSON from LLM output using: try json.loads() → regex patterns → fallback
description: Test procedural memory for extraction procedures

name: Retry policy
value: On API error: retry up to 3 times with exponential backoff (1s, 2s, 4s)
description: Test procedural memory for error handling policies

name: Memory deduplication
value: Use memory_key_hash to detect duplicate memory slots and update instead of insert
description: Test procedural memory for dedup rules

name: Outdated version
value: Old retry policy: just retry once
description: Should fail: v1 superseded by v2
